description: Gets the details of a specific batch job execution for a specific application.

parameters.name: executionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the batch job execution.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the application.

nested_items.name: batchJobIdentifier
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of this batch job.

nested_items.name: fileBatchJobIdentifier
nested_items.description: Specifies a file associated with a specific batch job.

nested_items.name: fileName
nested_items.description: The file name for the batch job identifier.

nested_items.name: folderPath
nested_items.description: The relative path to the file name for the batch job identifier.

nested_items.name: restartBatchJobIdentifier
nested_items.description: Specifies the required information for restart, including executionId and JobStepRestartMarker.

nested_items.name: executionId
nested_items.description: The executionId from the StartBatchJob response when the job ran for the first time.

nested_items.name: jobStepRestartMarker
nested_items.description: The step/procedure step information for a restart batch job operation.

nested_items.name: fromProcStep
nested_items.description: The procedure step name that a batch job was restarted from.

nested_items.name: fromStep
nested_items.description: The step name that a batch job was restarted from.

nested_items.name: skip
nested_items.description: The step-level checkpoint timestamp (creation or last modification) for an Amazon Web Services Blu Age application batch job.

nested_items.name: stepCheckpoint
nested_items.description: Skip selected step and issue a restart from immediate successor step for an Amazon Web Services Blu Age application batch job.

nested_items.name: toProcStep
nested_items.description: The procedure step name that a batch job was restarted to.

nested_items.name: toStep
nested_items.description: The step name that a batch job was restarted to.

nested_items.name: s3BatchJobIdentifier
nested_items.description: Specifies an Amazon S3 location that identifies the batch jobs that you want to run. Use this identifier to run ad hoc batch jobs.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that contains the batch job definitions.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: Identifies the batch job definition. This identifier can also point to any batch job definition that already exists in the application or to one of the batch job definitions within the directory that is specified in keyPrefix.

nested_items.name: fileName
nested_items.description: The name of the file that contains the batch job definition.

nested_items.name: scriptName
nested_items.description: The name of the script that contains the batch job definition.

nested_items.name: keyPrefix
nested_items.description: The key prefix that specifies the path to the folder in the S3 bucket that has the batch job definitions.

nested_items.name: scriptBatchJobIdentifier
nested_items.description: A batch job identifier in which the batch job to run is identified by the script name.

nested_items.name: scriptName
nested_items.description: The name of the script containing the batch job definition.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the batch job execution ended.

nested_items.name: executionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for this batch job execution.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for this batch job.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: The name of this batch job.

nested_items.name: jobStepRestartMarker
nested_items.description: The step/procedure step information for the restart batch job operation.

nested_items.name: fromProcStep
nested_items.description: The procedure step name that a batch job was restarted from.

nested_items.name: fromStep
nested_items.description: The step name that a batch job was restarted from.

nested_items.name: skip
nested_items.description: The step-level checkpoint timestamp (creation or last modification) for an Amazon Web Services Blu Age application batch job.

nested_items.name: stepCheckpoint
nested_items.description: Skip selected step and issue a restart from immediate successor step for an Amazon Web Services Blu Age application batch job.

nested_items.name: toProcStep
nested_items.description: The procedure step name that a batch job was restarted to.

nested_items.name: toStep
nested_items.description: The step name that a batch job was restarted to.

nested_items.name: jobType
nested_items.description: The type of job.

nested_items.name: jobUser
nested_items.description: The user for the job.

nested_items.name: returnCode
nested_items.description: The batch job return code from either the Blu Age or Micro Focus runtime engines. For more information, see Batch return codes in the IBM WebSphere Application Server documentation.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the batch job execution started.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the batch job execution.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the reported status.
